response.original_title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 6: Asian Spirits
response.overview: The beauty and mystery of the Far East come to life in this enchanting audiovisual experience. A series of Zen-inspired images, accompanied by relaxing ambient music, helps eliminate the stress and tensions of everyday life. These scenes of ancient Asian culture and awe-inspiring monuments stir the soul, sending viewers on a one-of-a-kind mental vacation.
response.title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 6: Asian Spirits
